content.content: So what is the Defi Education Fund doing w the $30 mill since the Infrastructure Bill was passed which defines developers as brokers starting in 2023 (lol) whats the $ being used for etc. ? is there anywhere we can follow this?

The DEF just completed their first grants. You can stay up to date by following their socials.   Medium – 30 Aug 21   DEF’s First Grants The DeFi Education Fund is pleased to announce the first slate of grant recipients, which include a mix of organizations and individuals…  Reading time: 3 min read       https://twitter.com/fund_defi  DEF Grants    DEF Grants The DeFi Education Fund’s (DEF) mission is to educate policymakers about the benefits of decentralized finance and to achieve regulatory clarity for the DeFi ecosystem. The DEF is nonpartisan and global in approach and orientation. To accomplish its...
